title: Stars in his eyes
brief_description: Marianne Guetta knows when her husband John tells her he has a plan, he’s thinking big! Over the years he helped organize the Sunbury rock festival, was the lighting director for channel nine on various major telecasts and is now planning to build an observatory and planetarium.
